body.name: Dash Cam 4K WiFi 2160P Dash Camera for Cars, Mini Front Car Camera, Wireless Mini Dash Cam with App, Night Vision. 24H Parking Mode, G-Sensor, Loop Recording,Support 256GB Max
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 1 hr 23 mins
features: 【4K Ultra HD 2160P Single Front Car Camera】The single front dash camera captures crystal clear video at UHD 3840*2160P/30fps, which clearly captures the license plates as well as road signs during the day and night. Equipped with 170° wide angle and super night vision reduces blind spots and covers four lanes easily which ensure clear and sharp footage even in dark conditions.

【Smooth 2.4G WiFi APP Control】Use the App to view and manage dashcam recordings instantly on your iOS and Android smartphone. Fast to download and share videos with friends and family through social media. Perfect wifi dash camera for cars, truck, SUV, easier to provide evidence when insurance claim.

【Seamless Loop Recording & G-sensor】When the storage limit is reached on the memory card, new recordings will automatically overwrite oldest recordings. Triggered by G-sensor, it can automatically detect a sudden shake/collision and lock the footage to prevent the video from being overwrote even in loop recording..

【Hands-Free Voice Control】Support voice command and clear voice prompt to control this camera for car. You can enjoy a hands-free and safer driving experience anytime, anywhere.The small screen helps you check the car dashboard camera status at a glance.

【24 Hours Parking Mode】Type C hardwire kit(not included) is required for this function. This dashcam will auto switch to parking mode while your car is parked. Collision detection can be triggered by impact or movement, time lapse recording mode keeps recording continuously with low power consumption and low frame rate. If your vehicle is involved in a hit while parked, or someone attempts to steal your vehicle, this dash cam will provide around-the-clock protection.
【Warranty & Customer Service】Our products comes with 3-year warranty. Any problem in using the products, please reach out to our 24/7 technical support will be happy to help you out at any time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SPADE Dash Cam 4K Single Front Dash Camera Built-in Wi-Fi--Compact and Super Easy to Install Single Front UHD 4K 2160P Resolution, Super Night Vision - Equipped with High-performance CMOS Sensor, F1.5 Large Aperture, 6-Glass Lens, can deliver professional 4K 30fps videos and 12MP photos, which is 4 times resolution of traditional 1080P dash cameras.Built-in WiFi - Easily access videos with App (IOS/Android available), provides a convenient way to view, download, share the footage. The APP allows you to easily share the video with your friends or family on social media such as YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest, TikTok, and many more.Compact & Super Easy to Install - With slim and compact design (Size: 3.7x1.8x1.4in), the dashcam takes up tiny space in your car, which won't obstruct your vision while driving. And simple installation and set up with excellent instructions included, no need to worry even for a first time user. Warm Tips: ✔Please check the functionality of the dash cam with its all accessories before installation. ✔Please use the original safety-tested accessories provided in the package, just in case of compatible issues after using others'. ✔Please use a class 10 or higher speed card(support up to 256GB, NOT included in the package). ✔Parking monitoring function requires the installation of an extra hardwire kit. ✔Please feel free to message us if any professional help in need.

High End 4K Resolution, Convenient Cellphone App, Simplified Installation of Compact Size Driving Recorder High End 4K Resolution, Convenient Cellphone App, Simplified Installation of Compact Size Driving Recorder 4K Ultra HD 2160P@30fpsBuilt-in Wifi & App ControlCompact and Super Easy to InstallSensitive G-sensorSeamless Loop Recording24-Hours Parking Monitor - Hardwire Kit Required, NOT Included in the packaging, Purchase separately PACKAGE CONTENT 1 x Dash Cam 1 x User Manual 1 x Car Charger 1 x Adhesive Pad 1x Electrostatic Film

Equipped with the Sony STARVIS sensor, 6 glass lens and F/1.6 large aperture, the car security camera obtains more light to brighten up dark conditions, providing you clear and sharp footage even at night time With built-in G-sensor, Q3 dashboard camera can automatically detect a sudden shake/collision and lock the footage to prevent the video from being overwritten even in loop recording. Accident scene can be truly restored. 150° front wide angle allows you to see every corner of the lane and know about the situation around the car, reduces blind spots and captures more details in front of your car, providing you and your car with all round protection.

New recordings will automatically overwrite the oldest recordings when the SD card is full, so the vehicle camera can record continuously without missing any moment. You can set the video length from 1,2,3 min on app. The voice broadcast function helps you know the current status of the dash camera. One example and most important one is letting you know if the impact reaches its set G-sensor level, the camera will locke it and says "Video Locked", and saves in Emergency Locked Folder. We highly recommend using a larger storage SD card with a capacity of up to 256GB, so that you can capture and store more video footage without the worry of running out of memory. And make sure you are using a Class 10 or faster speed SD card. Note: the SD card is not included in the package.

Specification Video Resolution 3840P*2160P 30fps Viewing Angle/Aperture 170°/F1.6 Connection Port Type C Port Storage Support Max 256GB. We recommend using a well-known brand U1 or Above SD Card Playback Method Smartphone/Tablet( APP); PC Battery & Charging NO battery; Power By Cigarette Lighter or Hardwire Kit Main Features WiFi-APP control, G-sensor, Loop Recording, Night Vision, Voice Prompt, 24H Parking Monitor, Time-lapse, H.265 Encoding

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive Performance and Versatility
reviews.reviewText: The dash cam is easy to set up and can connect with the very convenient APP. Also, it provides a clear view at night. Furthermore, the 3M stickers come with a screen protector, so you don't need to worry if the stickers stay on your window when you want to take them off. Overall the size is perfect, the visual is good, and it is worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for but…
reviews.reviewText: Product was okay.. like that it was easy discrete low profile and can be rotated..Dash cam would make a mechanical clicking sound which made me uncomfortable especially being hardwired to run until battery voltage was low enough had previous dash cam which ran almost to 3 years which was never made that sound..the noises it was making didnt emit that my car wouldnt burn down the next morningAlso the camera quality was not 4k by any means…maybe poor sensorI understand you get what you pay for but im pretty sure a cheaper camera would perform better for less..Nighttime footage was horrible other dash cam might have better sensor for nighttime viewing allowing to see plates and such..cant see anything without the slightest light..have a wolfbox d07 that i was looking to replace for something low profile but i’d prolly order another one and just keep the display offId say look elsewhere..shoot even if you find more expensive dashcam with promos prolly bring it down to this price anyways

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars HD, easy to use, reliable
reviews.reviewText: From unpacking the packaging to installing the device, the entire process is concise and clear, and there is almost no need to flip through the instructions. This recorder can capture clear and detailed images, whether under sunlight during the day or under dim street lights at night. This dash cam has proven its stability and reliability. This dash cam has been praised for its high-definition picture quality, easy operation, and reliable performance. This is undoubtedly a top choice worth considering for drivers looking for a high-performance and practical dash cam.From unpacking the packaging to installing the device, the entire process is concise and clear, and there is almost no need to flip through the instructions. This dash cam has been praised for its high-definition picture quality, easy operation, and reliable performance. This is undoubtedly a top choice worth considering for drivers looking for a high-performance and practical dash cam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to install/ good value product
reviews.reviewText: The camera is easy to install. Good value for the product. SD card is not included in the package but not big concern when you consider the price of the product. The camera is small and easy to install and doesn't my view when driving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's OK a little complicated 🙃 to connect it..but I will figure it out...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dash cam for front view
reviews.reviewText: The dash cam comes with 2 set of 3M stickers to attach it on the front window. I think it works well, you can adjust the angle of camera to a preferred view of recording. You can access the camera thru the app and Wi-Fi connection. It is also a small size item so it won’t be too visible for others. Everything you need to know is in manual in the package . Easy to install and getting start.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Wouldn’t stay connected to my phone
reviews.reviewText: I bought this dash cam on a flash sale and had hopes that it would be awesome to have. Instead, the camera would not stay connected to my phones WiFi like it’s supposed to. Especially on the Interstate. The daytime quality of the picture was pretty good and night time was just okay. So I have it 2 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Easy product to use, CANNOT read a license plate
reviews.reviewText: The camera was great until I reviewed my first videos. On an overcast day (perfect for pictures) with a car less than 10 feet in front of my front bumper I could not even try to read the plate number. This camera is supposed to be 4k?! I tried other clips too and no luck seeing any plate numbers. :-(
